main event: A radar operator on the British ship Leith Hill tracked an unidentified object over the Gulf of Mexico for 7.5 minutes on 8 July 1963.
interesting points: The object was observed on radar and was noted to have crossed the sky at a speed of 15 knots heading NW at 0155Z,It later changed direction and was observed heading SE at 10 knots.The sighting lasted for a total duration of 7.5 minutes,This report is part of the Project Blue Book documentation, indicating official interest in UFO sightings at that time,The report includes meteorological data such as weather conditions during the sighting.
